name: The Driver (Taprobana Studios)
description:
You are an undercover cop trying to take down a blacklist. Win races and chase and take down blacklist members. You can also work as a taxi to earn extra money. 

Use money to buy new cars and upgrades.  Watch out for damage and fuel percentages.

  • Race Types:
    • Checkpoint 
    • Duals 
    • War
    • Takedowns
    • Obstacle Courses
    • Taxi

  • Weather:
    • Rain
    • Mist
    • Dust
    • Lightening and Thunder
    • Day/Night
  • Features:
    • Easter eggs and popular references
    • Huge world with different locations to explore
    • Damage (headlight damage, damage smoke)
    • Interactive pedestrians
    • Wide range of cars and upgrades

Controls:

  • Drive: Arrow Keys / WASD
  • Handbrake: Space

Follow and reach to us on Insta @Taprobana_Studios

** Note : The game is not completed, this is a beta version to get some feedbacks, your feedbacks will help us improve.

** Please feel free to contact us for any suggestions or feedback

COMING SOON.
